item.title: Active Directory Hardening Series - Part 5 – Enforcing LDAP Channel Binding
item.description: Hi all! - Jerry Devore back again to talk more about securing LDAP. This time I want to cover LDAP channel binding. If you have been following this series, you already know that LDAP signing should be enforced to prevent relay and MITM attacks. So, what is the purpose of enforcing LDAP channel binding? Well, channel binding can be used to prevent relay and MITM attacks against LDAP. If you don’t find that explanation helpful you are not alone.
